```js
var clone = require('ramda/src/clone');

// flatten children nodes
const flattenChildren = (node, checked) => {
  const data = {[node.id]: node};
  const arr = [node];

  while (arr.length > 0) {
    let current = arr[0];
    arr.shift();
    if (typeof current.children !== 'undefined' && current.children !== null) {
      Object.keys(current.children).forEach((key) => {
        data[key] = current.children[key];
        data[key].checked = typeof checked !== 'undefined' ? checked : data[key].checked;
        data[key].parent = current;
        arr.push(current.children[key]);
      });
    }
  }
  return data;
}

// flatten parent nodes
const flattenParent = (node, checked) => {
  let results = {};
  let currNode = node;
  while (currNode.parent && currNode.parent !== null) {
    currNode.checked = typeof checked !== 'undefined' ? checked : currNode.checked;
    results = Object.assign(results, currNode);
    currNode = currNode.parent;
  }
  return results;
}

// flatten a tree
const flattenNode = (node, checked) => {
  return Object.assign(flattenParent(node, checked), flattenChildren(node, checked));
}

const update = (data) => {
  setState({
    data: Object.assign({}, data),
    flatData: Object.assign({}, state.flatData)
  })
}

const getRootNode = (reset) => {
  const {flatData} = state;
  let filter = flatData.undefined ? flatData.undefined : null;
  if (filter === null) {
    Object.keys(flatData).forEach((key) => {
      if (reset && typeof flatData[key].checked !== 'undefined') {
        flatData[key].checked = false;
      }
      if (flatData[key].name === 'Category') {
        filter = flatData[key];
      }
    });
  } else {
    Object.keys(flatData).forEach((key) => {
      if (reset && typeof flatData[key].checked !== 'undefined') {
        flatData[key].checked = false;
      }
    });
  }
  return filter;
}

const data = of Procedure","id":4038,"type":"Reference","parentId":4004}},"name":"Outcome","id":4004,"type":"Reference","parentId":4000},"4005":{"children":{"4039":{"name":"Likely to Recommend","id":4039,"type":"Reference","parentId":4005},"4040":{"name":"Likely to Come Back","id":4040,"type":"Reference","parentId":4005}},"name":"Loyalty","id":4005,"type":"Reference","parentId":4000}},"name":"Patient Satisfaction","id":4000,"type":"Reference","parentId":0}},"name":"Category","parentId":null};
data.type = 'checkbox';
const flatData = flattenNode(data, false);
const originalData = clone(data);

initialState = {
  data: data,
  originalData: originalData,
  flatData: flatData
};

<InputBox
  name="Category"
  filter={state.data}
  multipleSelect={true}
  checkFilter={(name, filter, checked) => {
    if (multipleSelect) {
      filter.checked = checked;
      if (checked) {
        flattenChildren(filter, true);
      }
      if (!checked) {
        flattenParent(filter, false);
        flattenChildren(filter, false);
      }
    } else {
      Object.keys(state.flatData).forEach((key) => { if (typeof state.flatData[key].checked !== 'undefined') { state.flatData[key].checked = false; } });
      filter.checked = checked;
      flattenChildren(filter, true);
    }

    const rootNode = getRootNode(false);
    const checkedFilter = filter.parent && filter.parent !== null ? filter.parent : filter;
    const searchFilter = rootNode.search_result && rootNode.search_result.length > 0 ? rootNode : checkedFilter;
    update(searchFilter);
  }}
  updateFilter={(data) => {
    const rootNode = getRootNode(false);
    rootNode.search_result = [];
    update(data);
  }}
  searchFilter={(value) => {
    const filter = state.flatData.undefined ? state.flatData.undefined : getRootNode();
    const result = [];
    Object.keys(state.flatData).forEach((key) => {
      if (result.length < 15 && state.flatData[key].name.toLowerCase().indexOf(value.toLowerCase()) !== -1) { result.push(state.flatData[key]); }
    });
    filter.search_result = result;
    update(filter);
  }}
  resetSearch={() => {
    const filter = state.flatData.undefined ? state.flatData.undefined : getRootNode();
    filter.search_result = [];
    update(filter);
  }}
  uncheckAll={() => {
    const filter = getRootNode(true);
    update(filter);
  }}
  search
/>
```
